0: The hotel was typically Hilton including a great selection of cocktails in the bar
In short recommended if you need the comfort and accessibility of a good business hotel
I have stayed at the Munich City Hotel since the early 80s because of its location
We stayed four nights in a standard room with breakfast included
Flight crews from 4 major airlines stay there also
Just down the street is Rosenheimer Platz with eating drinking and shopping
I based this on the uniform and then there being a gentleman in a suit standing their when I returned
Another plus point is direct train access to the airport which is most convenient
Stay here for convenience eat somewhere else for quality
1: The hotel is currently undergoing a major renovation
I never write bad reviews for hotels but I want to make sure no one else is treated as I was
The hotel is a 15 20 minute walk from Marienplatz with lots of shopping bars and sights
If you want to waste money here is very recommended for you
It ’s really races front desk guys distinguished between White and others
2: I only wish they had prepared us for the renovations and compensated their guests with anything
Other than an issue with the A C we loved it
But that can not be helped I am sure the improvements will be worth it when completed
My mantra when I ran bars was that the customer was right
There were two bottles of water in the room mini bar but on a hot day you run out quickly
I would specially want to mention a conceirge whose name i do nt know but he was very helpful and booked tickets for us online from munich to salzburg
As Diamond you get two complimentary bottles of water in the room per stay and there are no individual water bottles in the Exec lounge
The receptionist at the check in was so unfriendly and she really made me feel so unwelcome
Check in was good though no appreciation for Gold members but our room was upgraded to the next level
